text: 6.18 Lom 12.13, Gal 6.6, Tat 3.8, Hib 13.16, Jem 2.5 Anɨb ak kɨlop age, tap gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgel. Tap teplep lum awl kuŋay mɨdeb okok anɨb ak tek, binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop abe ñɨtep gɨnɨgel. Kɨlop pelpel gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgel. Pen tap kɨli kuŋay okok, tap chɨn ke mel, binɨb okok kɨlop dɨtep gun agɨl, tap monmon ñɨnɨgel.
